description_part1: A blood donation camp is normally held from
description_part3: This time frame ensures that the collected blood can be properly processed. Once donated, blood must be separated into blood constituents within six hours. Therefore, blood donation camps cannot exceed this time limit.
description_part4: Planning your camp within this time frame helps ensure that every donation makes the maximum impact in saving lives!
